patthana16.38:1.1: Hīnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahīno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.38:2.1: Hīnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namajjhimo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
